general.name: Oliver Ng
general.headline: Computer Science @ SFU
about: I'm passionate about building creative, impactful solutions that lie at the intersection of technology, finance, and entrepreneurship. I enjoy working on projects that require both problem-solving and strategic collaboration, and Iâ€™m currently exploring opportunities in product development, design, and project management in emerging tech.

Outside of work, Iâ€™m fascinated by how new ideas are developed, especially in fields such as investment, business strategy, and entrepreneurship. I love traveling, exploring new cultures, and understanding how different parts of the world operate. I'm driven by curiosity and always looking to expand my knowledge and perspectives.

experiences.title: Full-Stack Developer Co-op
description: Upgraded enterprise Java services to Jakarta EE 10 with JDK 17, improving maintainability and compliance
Automated javax to jakarta package migration using Eclipse Transformer and OpenRewrite, accelerating upgrade process.
Collaborated with architects and DBAs to update WSDL JARs and Maven dependencies for system compatibility.
Maintained Spring Boot configurations and managed PostgreSQL databases to support modernization.

experiences.title: Software Developer Co-op
experiences.company: Government of Canada â€“ Cyber Security
description: Developed high-performance C++ data ingestion systems enhancing secure stream processing capabilities.
Refactored Base64 encoding routines to improve processing speed by ~25%.
Built hex string to byte conversion utility, improving data parsing reliability across systems.
Implemented priority throttle bypass integrated to optimized data flow.
Supported analyst workflows by creating Python Kafka consumer tools and Jupyter Notebook dashboards.

projects.name: Library Database Management System
projects.description: A full-stack library management system featuring user management, transaction processing, and analytics for tracking book circulation.

projects.name: SAM Segmentation Machine
projects.description: Web app for zero-shot lung CT segmentation integrating PyTorch SAM model with a Flask API backend and React frontend.

projects.name: Exam Scheduler Web Application
projects.description: Collaborative exam scheduling app with role-based access, availability management, and automated email notifications.
